title: Local shortsighted ploiticians have suggested selling Airlie Gardens to make up for the budget shortfall.  Is this possible? What were the terms of the original donation?  I am shocked. The politican was a realtor. How can we make sure that realtor/politicians, like Saffo aren\'t making suggestions like this in their own vested interests?. How can citizens band together to get this off the table?
text:
Here's a story about the easement that was approved:
